long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever wanted Codeforces to have handy shortcuts, auto-updating standings, problem tags that you can hide/show on demand, better site navigation, a dark theme, or all of the above? These and many more features are available in Codeforces++! This extension is open-source and hosted at GitHub https://github.com/LeoRiether/CodeforcesPP
